text: Unless also licensed by the Board of Medicine to practice medicine in the District, practitioners of naturopathic medicine shall:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 15-172, see notes following ยง 3-1201.02.

DC CODE ยง 3-1206.22

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Provide to the client or patient, before providing services, a written notice in a language the client or patient understands that the practitioner is not licensed to practice medicine; and
Obtain written acknowledgment from the client or patient that the client or patient has been provided the notice required in paragraph (1) of this section.

title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Naturopathic Medicine; Scope of Practice; Required Disclosures.
